sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Glibc-&glibc-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: Bash: sh Binutils: ar, as, ld, ranlib, readelf Diffutils: cmp Fileutils: chmod, cp, install, ln, mknod, mv, mkdir, rm, touch Gcc: cc, cc1, collect2, cpp, gcc Grep: egrep, grep Gzip: gzip Make: make Gawk: gawk Sed: sed Sh-utils: date, expr, hostname, pwd, uname Texinfo: install-info, makeinfo Textutils: cat, cut, sort, tr
